amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part D of House Report 118-108 to strike provisions in the bill that would significantly limit future DOE rulemaking authority.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike provisions in the bill that would significantly limit future Department of Energy rulemaking authority.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 225 (Roll no. 267).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Pallone.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 225 (Roll no. 267).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
